posts.title: ChatGPT-11-format
posts.text: ChatGPT 可以生成的 11 种强大的输出格式1. GraphExample Prompt:Create a line graph showing the Google search trends for a particular AI over the past year. 2. ChecklistExample Prompt:Create a checklist for preparing for a job interview. 3. ScorecardExample Prompt:Can you generate output in a scorecard format on how apple stocks performed against tesla in past 5 years. 4. JSONExample Prompt:Can you provide details of the last 2 FIFA world cup winners in JSON format? I want the following to include a date, opponent name, winner name, score, and stadium name. 5. ChartExample Prompt:Johnny made $50k sale in Jan, $40K in Feb and $30k in March. Shaun made $60k sale in Jan, $20K in Feb and $75k in March. Can you put this data in a bar chart? 6. TableExample Prompt:Can you provide details of the last 2 FIFA world cup winners in JSON format? I want the following to include a date, opponent name, winner name, score, and stadium name. 7. CodeExample Prompt:Write { Code you want to generate } in { programming language } 8. CSVExample Prompt:Can you provide details of the last 2 ICC cricket world cup winners in CSV format? I want the following to be included in it a date, opponent name, winner name, score, stadium name. 9. XML/ YAMLExample Prompt:Give me data on the USA population for the years 2012 and 2013. I want the total count with males and females breakdown in XML and YAML format. 10. SVGExample Prompt:Create SVG of a smiling face. 11. DiagramsExample Prompt:Can you provide me with a diagram of the solar system? Ref11 Powerful output formats ChatGPT can produce ( with examples ) 🧵:(https://twitter.com/MakadiaHarsh/status/1634215629225070593?t=cZcV6HpNO7UdUH_ycEWL_g&s=03)

posts.title: download_kindle
posts.text: Download your chinese kindleKindle_download_helperKindle_download_helper 主要步骤： pip3 install kindle_download git clone https://github.com/yihong0618/Kindle_download_helper.git && cd Kindle_download_helper pip3 install -r requirements.txt python3 kindle.py –dedrm –cn ## –dedrm 移除 DRM

posts.title: chat-gpt-write-ppt
posts.text: 让ChatGPT帮你做PPT需求把你的需求描述给ChatGPT, 让它写一段VBA程序，需求越清晰越好 例如：“我想写一段PowerPoint的vba，要求如下：新建10个页面，设置页面格式为图片填充，图片随机引从一个文件夹中引用，文件夹路径是”C:\tmp\pic”， 并在每页居中插入一个中文标题“请输入你的大标题”，字体颜色为白色，字体大小为30好，字体选择微软雅黑，在页面靠左对齐” 生成PPT 打开PPT， 在自定义功能区启用[开发者工具] 在开发中工具里点击Visual Basic，新建一个模板把代码贴进去，点击运行

posts.title: ffmpeg-help
posts.text: ffmpeg使用视频格式转换视频转成16:9格式 1ffmpeg -i "5.avi" -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -vf "scale=w=trunc(ih*dar/2)*2:h=trunc(ih/2)*2, setsar=1/1, scale=w=1920:h=1080:force_original_aspect_ratio=1, pad=w=1920:h=1080:x=(ow-iw)/2:y=(oh-ih)/2:color=#000000" "output.mp4" 1ffmpeg -i "Chap-GPT-01.mp4" -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -vf "scale=w=trunc(ih*dar/2)*2:h=trunc(ih/2)*2, setsar=1/1, scale=w=1080:h=1920:force_original_aspect_ratio=1, pad=w=1080:h=1920:x=(ow-iw)/2:y=(oh-ih)/2:color=#000000" "output.mp4"

posts.title: Hexo配置
posts.text: Hexo ConfigThemes: NextScheme选择 SchemeScheme 是 NexT 提供的一种特性，借助于 Scheme，NexT 为你提供多种不同的外观 Muse - 默认 Scheme，这是 NexT 最初的版本，黑白主调，大量留白 Mist - Muse 的紧凑版本，整洁有序的单栏外观 Pisces - 双栏 Scheme，小家碧玉似的清新 设置 语言将 language 设置成你所需要的语言。建议明确设置你所需要的语言，例如选用简体中文，配置如下： language: zh-Hans Refhttp://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
